name: Evolution in DesignZ
description:
Evolution in DesignZ is a team of Toronto Website designers who offer clean, easy to manage website solutions. From WordPress websites to custom designed content management systems, every website and app we develop is easy to update and secure. Our e-commerce websites offer over 25 functions to allow your e-commerce website to remain competitive for years to come. We also offer app development for android, Blackberry, iOS and Windows Mobile devices.
For more specific requirements, we offer fully custom programmed applications like custom CRMs and inventory management systems to help you run your business more efficiently. 
The core team at Evolution in DesignZ consists of website designers, website programmers and project managers who all worked for other website design firms in Toronto before starting Evolution in DesignZ. 
So how exactly are we different than all the other development agencies in Toronto? We listen, we deliver and we’re here to make sure you get the best possible website, app, ranking or system.
